name: ActivityFeed
functionalRequirements:
## Activity Feed

### Purpose
Display recent sales activities in a timeline format.

### Features
- Chronological activity list
- Activity type icons
- Timestamps and descriptions
- User avatars or initials
- Click to view activity details

dataRequirements.description: Displays recent CRM activities in timeline format

entities.name: Activities
entities.usageContext: Recent activities displayed in chronological feed

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- activities: Array of activity objects
- onActivityClick: Callback for activity selection

### Display
- Timeline layout
- Activity cards with metadata
- Time formatting
